createRiskPool(string,string,address,add.details: create Risk pool with UNO from SSIP owner

getTotalWithdrawPendingAmount().details: get total withdraw request amount in pending for the risk pool in UNO

getWithdrawRequestPerUser(address).details: get withdraw request amount in pending per user in UNO

leaveFromPending().details: user can submit claim again and receive his funds into his wallet after 10 days since last WR.

leaveFromPoolInPending(uint256).details: WR will be in pending for 10 days at least
